en.text: Yan Lei (born 1965, Lanfang) graduated from the China Academy of Art, Hangzhou, in 1991. He works in painting, video, photography, and installation, belonging to a generation of artists who use art to negotiate authority. He takes images from Chinese and Western popular culture and manipulates them, often digitally, to challenge the power structures of the art system. Yan lives and works in Beijing and Hong Kong.

zh-hant.text: 顏磊 (1965年生於廊坊，現工作及生活於北京及香港)，1991年畢業於杭州中國美術學院，作品涵蓋繪畫、錄像、攝影及裝置等媒介，被視為利用藝術與權力談判的新一代藝術家一分子。他從中國和西方流行文化抽取圖像，並常利用數碼技術將圖像篡改，以挑戰展覽制度裡的權力結構。
